data.text:
Okay everyone! We'll be doing vocal lessons 
in preparation for the live concert!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Okay everyone! We'll be doing vocal lessons 
󠁿in preparation for the live concert!

data.text:
Hawawawa! The blue sky, the white clouds, 
and that wild smell…! For what reason!? 
Why!? Please tell me, Shiraoki-sama!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
󠁿Hawawawa! The blue sky, the white clouds, 
󠁿and that wild smell…! For what reason!? 
󠁿Why!? Please tell me, Shiraoki-sama!

data.text:
Oh! Scarlet, look over there! 
It's a restless bull! It's huge! 
I wonder if I could ride it like a motorbike!
data.name: Vodka
data.processed:
󠁿Oh! Scarlet, look over there! 
󠁿It's a restless bull! It's huge! 
󠁿I wonder if I could ride it like a motorbike!

data.text:
Why are you so excited!? Jeez, they said this 
was going to be a lesson, so why did they force 
me onto a train and bring me here…!?
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
󠁿Why are you so excited!? Jeez, they said this 
󠁿was going to be a lesson, so why did they force 
󠁿me onto a train and bring me here…!?

data.text:
No no, there's a reason we had to come all the way out here! I 
heard that the anniversary live concert venue will be so so big!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿No no, there's a reason we had to come all the way out here! I 
󠁿heard that the anniversary live concert venue will be so so big!

data.text:
That's why we needed to come to this big farm! 
Let's practice using our outdoor voices!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why we needed to come to this big farm! 
󠁿Let's practice using our outdoor voices!
